thongtin: After 3 years of marriage, the couple had their first child
After 4 years together, the husband discovered that the first child was the neighbor's son
After giving birth to her first child, the husband discovered that he was infertile
The wife is always angry with her husband for no reason after giving birth to the first child
While pregnant with her first child, the wife discovered that her husband had an affair and had a child of his own
The husband wants a divorce from his wife because the first child born is a girl
Mother forces her son to marry a girl because she is pregnant with his first child
The wife is despised by her husband's family because she is a girl at birth
After 23 years of abandoning her first child, the son returned to take revenge on the mother who abandoned him
Although divorced, the mother-in-law still tries to rob her first grandson
Divorced for 5 years, the husband meets his wife again and discovers that she has a 5-year-old child
Once, the wife found out that her only child was swapped with her best friend
The girl discovered that the neighbor's only child had many similarities with her husband
The wife received a huge fortune from her husband's family when she gave birth to her first child, a boy
The first child was born and thrown away, growing up now accidentally works at the mother's company
The newly born and abandoned child is now the lover of her current biological daughter
My only child fell in love with the enemy's daughter
The eldest son is rich and the second son is poor
The wife found out that her husband was having an affair with her stepchild.
The eldest son found out that his father molested his daughter-in-law
Because she was poor, she abandoned her first child but was picked up and raised by her best friend
tomLuocText: Abandoned child adopted by best friend.

thongtin: At the age of 16, the girl gave birth to a child. Her mother decided to adopt her grandchild as a daughter
The husband discovered that the first child was the wife's child with the housekeeper
The father is shocked to see that his son is a math prodigy.
tomLuocText: Father shocked by son's math genius.

thongtin: Parents divorce just because the first child loves his mother more than his father.
